mapper.select: SELECT id, title, content, type, redirect_url as redirectUrl, is_read as isRead, created_at as createdAt FROM notification WHERE receiver_id = #{receiverId} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 50
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notification WHERE receiver_id = #{receiverId} AND is_read = false
mapper.update: UPDATE notification SET is_read = true WHERE receiver_id = #{receiverId} AND is_read = false
